title: Naturalism and miracles w/ JP Marceau and Paul Vanderklay- Voices with Vervaeke
description:
JP Marceau has integrated my work on non-reductive naturalism with arguments from C.S. Lewis to advance a case for the possibility of miracles. Paul Vanderklay has a long standing interest in Lewis' book on miracles. I argue that a naturalistic neoplatonism opens up to the extraordinary but precludes the need for supernatural miracles, but this leads to the discussion whether miracles are supernatural.  I loved participating in this wonderful dia logos. 

Paul's channel:  https://www.youtube.com/user/paulvanderklay
JP's channel:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZzlvx0HHYiPOJTEOU399WA
